title: "Spatial-temporal variogram"
---

```{r}
ref_rs <- terra::rast("data/ref_raster.nc")

r1 <- feather::read_feather(files$path[1]) |>
    dplyr::select(lon, lat, OC) |>
    terra::rast(type = "xyz", extent = terra::ext(ref_rs))

r2 <- feather::read_feather(files$path[2]) |>
    dplyr::select(lon, lat, OC) |>
    terra::rast(type = "xyz", extent = terra::ext(ref_rs))


```
